reviews.text: We loved this place. Good for children. Awesome display of trucks and cars from DAF history. It has a snack and coffee shop inside. They had a new, bright orange truck that they allowed visitors inside of. There are many hands-on exhibits. The smell of lubricating oil from the trucks was wonderful.

Really interesting to see the rich history of DAF with so many different cars & trucks for different applications and restored in such great condition. Presentation is well done too. Exceeded my expectations.

The kids loved it and me too. It's great that you can climb into some vehicles and you can really experience the size of a truck. 
The old cars look cute. The only thing which could be improved is the cafe - maybe some more cookies? But the rest is nice.

You can see the history of passenger cars, military trucks and lovely trucks. There are also different types of engines. There are some great movies about military, racing, firefighting and commercial trucks. Don't miss it.
To visit the place carefully you need around 4 hours. The staffs are great.
The only drawback was that the explanation for passenger cars were just in Dutch!

Could be more historical artifacts presented, films, pictures, models for the very early time of the company. But the rest showpieces are very interesting and informative, and don't miss the opportunity to get into the cabin of the most modern DAF truck (orange one in the large hall next to a wall).
It was so nice and I did not is so interesting. Love it. If you are in Eindhoven go there and you will enjoy. Price for ticket is really good, round 8 euro. :)))

It is a very nice museum with great content. It is very impressive to find out all these major breakthroughs of the company, their history step by step. The action of the Philips company during WW2 was an interesting story. Nevertheless, there were a few things I didn't like at all. A part of the museum has to do with the first Philips factory. A guide describes this exhibit only in Dutch, and thus I couldn't learn anything about it. Also, because it is a great museum for children too, there was too much noise. Finally, I expected a more impressive and interactive exhibition. Perhaps there is too much information provided in a not so proper way.

A really amazing experience of the history of Phillips and how it has influenced the culture of Eindhoven.

The museum itself is small so you can easily walk around without assistance from the museum staff.

What I really liked about it is that even though some of the museum pieces are locked behind glass walls, there is quite a lot of pieces that you can touch and play around with. The floor above was my favorite, it gives you the feeling of how Phillips has changed the lives of homes by re-creating living rooms, kitchen, teen bedrooms etc.

I did not know how much influence Phillips has had on music but I'm glad I do now.
It’s only worth visiting if you have nothing else to do, or if you are into technology history. Most of the exposition is about the growth of Philips and their products
The history is amazing and the story behind the factories and workers. An outstanding company
Art space for residancies and expositions. Very interesting stuff always, very nice atmosphere.
Excellent.
Gezellige uitstap voor het hele gezin. Gratis parkeren.
Leuk
It was so nice and I did not is so interesting. Love it. If you are in Eindhoven go there and you will enjoy. Price for ticket is really good, round 8 euro. :)))

Nice modern place with quaint stores. Pedestrians walk free. No traffic here.
Even though it was very busy we were helped quickly
Wirth visiting! Museum, cinema, shops clothes shoes and others, markets, and great restaurants
Small but very nice!!!
Some nice, different shops. Great book shop and a delicious restaurant called Emma. Definitely worth a visit!
Beautiful church

* just went around
* nice from outside
Staat nu nog in de steigers en wordt door Dela verder geëxploiteerd. Naast de bekende disciplines welke Dela biedt komt er ook een conferentie hotel met 66 kamers.
Cudowna architektura gotycka - prosta, surowa .. jak cały protestantyzm. Niestety był zamknięty, więc zrobiłem zdjęcia z zewnątrz.
Beautiful Church!
Magnificent church for Sint Joris. Nice architecture and beautiful stained glass windows.
Dutch mass Mon-Sat at 19:00, Sun at 11:00 & 18:00 Adoration Mon-Fri at 18:00,
Beautiful church!
Nice church and beautifull inside
Amazing venue.
Beautiful old church next to old graveyard.
Een mooie kerk in Eindhoven.  Hier wordt nog iedere zondag een Heilige Mis opgedragen
Ik ben koorlid van cantores viannex. iedere 1e en 3e zondag om 10 uur. plus iedere dinsdag repetitie.
Prachtige kerk een van de weinigen die nog in Eindhoven open is,en er wordt nog iedere zondag een heilige  mis gelezen.
Ein denkwürdiger  Ort
Nice modern place with quaint stores. Pedestrians walk free. No traffic here.
Even though it was very busy we were helped quickly
Wirth visiting! Museum, cinema, shops clothes shoes and others, markets, and great restaurants
Small but very nice!!!
Some nice, different shops. Great book shop and a delicious restaurant called Emma. Definitely worth a visit!

Great staff, great food and great ambiance! We went on a Tuesday night because at 20:00 subscriptions open to a pubquiz. Great quiz, it is every Tuesday night and it is truly challenging! We had a great night!
Really nice location, very trendy and very good booked. Reservation is needed! Food, especially the Burgers are very good. Had a Bug Burger and was impressed how good it was.
Always a great time in this place. Always add a visit to this place when I’m in Eindhoven.

Friendly staff, clean bathrooms, normal selection of beers. It feels cramped though. Waiters kept squeezing past us and the later it got the fuller it got. I would have loved it if they stopped letting more people in when the place was full. At some point it felt more like an overfilled club. Noise levels are also unbearable. I had to scream in my friends' ears in order to have a conversation.
Good food and good service
The administrator lady is very rude. She goes to kitchen without uniform. We tried to ask her why but the answer was: It is not your bussiness.The vodka quality is very bad (we had Beluga on friday).
Been there many times during my 4-month stay in Almaty.  Nice place but bit expensive in terms of Almaty.
Legendary place and good food
Great music and dancing

Great look and atmosphere
Discovered to late but definitely coming back
Foods are Not really tasty compare with the price...

All food just taste garlic. Poor service. We were informed after 30min that what we order was over. Needed to change from fish to meet after we already ordered white wine.
Uh, we also enjoyed the company of mice..
They serve a plate with a choice of 4 dishes for around €17,- per person. Good selection of food and nice staff. Would recommend.
Great food @ reasonable prices. Good / spacious outdoor seating. Great for families. OK service. All-in-all a vetou enjoyable evening / meal.
a small place with great service and even better food.
They are so nice and they have affordable prices and the options are crazy awesome. Loved going there and definitely going back. Owner was extremely hands on and made the experience amazing.
Beautiful dresses and great prices!!
Very good quality for a price that won't break your bank! Beautiful side selection, would recommend to everyone in need of tux or dresses and accessories!!

Claudia and staff are very knowledgeable and friendly.  There is always a beautiful selection of gowns, dresses, and accessories.  Best place for men to rent formal wear.  Highly recommend them for all your wedding and formal needs.
Very nice selection and staff is helpful, however if you need time to think they are very pushy and will pressure you into buying a dress right away

a few weeks ago I ordered pizza with hair today I decided to order again and I was suprised because we get pizza gratis because of this incident and it was really good! Thats why am change this comment! Thanks guys keep this quality thumb up!

Ordered at 7.49 pm.. got a call around 8.30 to ask if it is ok to deliver at 9.30 or they can cancel the order! Why would i order if I wanted to cancel and order at some other place and wait for food again.. not the first time this is happening! And the pizza is cold and dry when it reaches! Worst take out place!
One of the best pizzas in Eindhoven...
Good pizzas for a very affordable price. The staff is very nice and friendly, they speak English quite well.
Tasteful pizzas, kind employee's
Great sushi! Every type was made to perfection... Staff was so friendly! I arrived an hour before they closed down, so didn't get the full experience (they close at 10)
Love the sushi at the sushi bar! Very convenient for a quick bite. For their warm dished I'd recommend their Age-tempura and their tenderloin.
Eating while someone is cooking right in front of you is a nice experience. Good food, good and friendly service. Price is very reasonable for this special place

Last few times we experienced unfriendly personnel. But today it was something: we were accused of hiding plastic plates under our table (last two visits!) to save few euros, and no proof was presented. Owner was unable to explain details of the issue. One senior waitress always was unfriendly, but today she started to cry on us and even pushed my wife.

Yokohama is a very nice place that feels quite formal! But you got to like the formal style of the place to find comfort in this place I personally really enjoy that because of it! And ofcourse you get to enjoy the show of preparing the food for you! (Only if you go for tapenyaki that is! Because there is also a sushi conveyer belt in the room next to it)

I've noticed asside from the appetizer and the main meat course that the menus are quite alike! Not like that it's a bad thing but mention worthy.

But overall! A nice pleasant place with great professional and pleasant personnel from hanging up your coat to the professional way of speaking to you! Keep it up! And next time! We'll try the sushi side :)

Nice, upscale restaurant offering high cuisine. The restaurant is situated in the middle of nature and resembles a big estate. The food was carefully prepared and tasted really good. The staff did a wonderful job waiting at our table and explaining us everything. Overall a wonderful place to spend an evening and experience the culinary journey.
We had a Groupon 5 course menu. It was delicious and looked wanderful. The ambiance was also very nice. The service however could have been a little better.
absolutely recommendable - great atmosphere, very enjoyable service and quality food
We had a beautiful evening in this restaurant.  We had a cook workshop. The people run this restaurant with a lot of passion for their work.
Excellent and very friendly services. It is always a pleasure to visit this very stylish restaurant.

My girlfriend and I saved money for a year to eat here at our anniversary. We ate here about a year ago and everything was amazing about that evening. A great atmosphere, a fun waiter with an immense knowledge of the wines served and the most incredible meal I ever had. Innovative, passionate and thoughtful meals are brought in small sizes with grand flavors. I would advise eating here to everyone and I hope Zarzo will continue being awesome!

Not just a dinner out, this is a whole experience! Everything from the reception, the design, the tables arrangement, the beautiful tableware, the super kind and helpful service, the dishes explanation, everything was perfect! Each dish was an experience itself, especially the cheesecake dessert which I had to mix myself. i looooved loved loved the cheesecake thing!! Of course it’s not necessary to mention the food itself, which was absolutely fantastic. I was in constant awe and couldn’t stop smiling. Besides enjoying great food, I had a lot of fun! I came here for a special evening with my boyfriend and cannot wait for my next visit. Thank you so much!

Wonderful atmosphere, great service, and overall a great experience, however despite telling us they offered a vegan option and booking 5 months in advance because of this, the food was very disappointing. My main meal of the 5 course option was half a boiled cauliflower with some nuts on it, which was completely tasteless, not presented well and had cheese on it. The desert was not much better. It was like they gave up trying. I might say the other members of my party had wonderful food very well presented and delicious. I will not be returning.
Burst of flavors in every bite. On the expensive side but good for a special occasion. Presentation and service is also excellent.
Words can't describe this tasting.  The food was amazing! The wine pairing was on Point.  If I could give this place 6 stars I would.
It was really good. better than Colorado springs McDonald's.. Everything was fresh thank you

The coke machine is always broken, service is crapy, and the wait is not worth the food. You could go somewhere for better food and get it faster. If you are in a rush go somewhere else, this place is not worth it. To top it all off it is not kid friendly anymore. They have electronic devices that don’t even work half the time. I went once and a baby got run over by a high chair. NOT kid friendly at all.
My weakness! Always a crowd but worth the wait. This location one of the cleanest for being so busy.
Wow looks really nice, so modern, good customer service and they have some good deals.

Nasty food..filthy restaurant .. I am so fed up with the sorry excuse for customer service. I came in today and ordered chicken nuggets, no dipping sauce but 2 packs of mayo, they charged me for the mayo, then tried to give me someone elses food. after they handed my food to the car in front of me, they gave me the same food without replacing it. This place is a horrible location. I will never go back to this location. The sad thing is the owners could care less.
